thread.section_title: Hotel Giuliana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for a quick weekend
thread.title_full: Perfect for a quick weekend - Review of Hotel Giuliana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: alyson d
title: Perfect for a quick weekend
text:
Wonderful lady runs this hotel and like all hotels would prefer you book directly with her rather than on internet websites. Other comments made about this hotel are accurate but it was amazing value for a quick weekend in beautiful Rome. Everything was clean and the windows opened, if I had one suggestion it would be to get rid of the blankets on the beds and replace with easy fresh duvets or at least new covers.
The large entry door and strange lift made the hotel all the more charming we felt.
